      Returns:
      block face

    • fromHorizontalAngle

      public static BlockFace fromHorizontalAngle(double angle)
      Get the BlockFace corresponding to the given angle (0-360). An angle of 0 is SOUTH, an angle of 90 would be WEST
      Parameters:
      angle - horizontal angle
      Returns:
      block face
